text: Cambridge School Indirapuram (often called CSI) is a private co-educational school from Pre-Nursery up to 12th grade, located in Indirapuram, Ghaziabad, India. Cambridge School Indirapuram which was established on 15 April, 1999. It now has more than 2,000 students. The school is affiliated to the Central Board for Secondary Education. The school is administered by the Society for the Advancement of Education. The school's motto is We Learn to Serve. ==History== Mr. Harendra Chakhaiyar left the position as the Principal in September 2019. ===Current administration=== {| class="wikitable" |Principal - Mrs. Hardeep Kaur |- |Vice Principal - TBA |- |Headmistress (Primary School) - Ms. Preeti Sirohi |- |Academic Supervisor (Senior Section) - Mrs. Swati Dixit |- |Academic Supervisor (Middle Section) - Mrs. Seema Upadhyay |- |Academic Supervisor (Primary Section) - Mrs. Malvika Shrivastav |} ==Campus== Cambridge School Indirapuram is a day co-ed school with 2,000 students on its rolls. The school has a campus of 5.2 acres with 4 entry/exit gates. It has also a play ground for outdoor sports. There is also a separate play garden for the young children. The school has a Multi Purpose Hall which is used both as an Auditorium and for indoor games such as Badminton and Table Tennis. The school also has a Swimming Pool which is currently closed, due to fact that is six feet deep, which is deemed unsafe for children. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Private schools in Uttar Pradesh Category:Primary schools in Uttar Pradesh Category:High schools and secondary schools in Uttar Pradesh Category:Education in Ghaziabad district, Uttar Pradesh Category:Educational institutions established in 1999 Category:1999 establishments in India
title: Cambridge School Indirapuram
